script: Where's the marketing department?
options: I've been to the farmers market.

script: What time does your flight leave?
Who reviewed the order forms?
options: Sure, I'll sign for the delivery.

script: How much do the tickets cost?
Would you like to have lunch with us?
Should we discuss the merger tomorrow or Friday?
Why are you still at the office?
options: Please leave it with my assistant.
The room at the end of the hall.

script: Doesn't the art exhibit open today?
options: Sure, you can leave it open.

script: When did Takumi start working here?
options: I think it was a year ago.

script: We still sell this brand of washing machine, don't we?
options: Yes, there are some in stock.

script: Haven't you finished the report yet?
Do you want to fly or drive to the trade show?
options: The new French film is showing tonight.

script: Who's leading the focus group meeting on Friday?
Why don't we create some videos for the interns?
options: A review of our television show.

script: Prackwood Bank has extended business hours today, doesn't it?
options: Only at the Main Street location.

script: When do concert tickets go on sale?
Has anyone volunteered to organize the reception?
options: Sorry, I don't have a receipt.

script: How do I turn off the copy machine?
options: I still need to make a few.
I will call a few mechanics.

script: I'm calling to make an appointment with a physical therapist.
options: Yes, that is my home address.
Your next options are next Monday or Tuesday.

script: Our fabric shipment hasn't arrived yet, has it?
options: There's a printer on my desk.

script: Did you send all staff the revised vacation policy?
options: You'll need a visitor badge to enter the building.
Our computer system has been down all morning.

script: What's the telephone number for Primavera restaurant?
options: Our supervisor is expecting his call.

script: Could you represent our company at the recruitment fair this week?
options: Thomas said not to get him any presents.
I always enjoy meeting new people.

script: The engine's been making a strange noise for the past hour.
options: We'd better go find some oil.
No, I'm not going to make anything for the party.
Let's turn down the volume on the TV.

script: Where can we buy a microwave oven for the office kitchen?
options: My office is located near the kitchen.
There's one in the storage area.
